        FILTER(

        ),
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_InvoiceID],
        "Inv_InvoiceAmountSys", MIN('Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_InvoiceAmountSys])

RETURN

VAR TopNCount = 5
VAR CurrentIssuer = SELECTEDVALUE(Report_Payment_Vs_Due[InvIssuer_InvoiceIssuerCode])
VAR RankedIssuers =
    TOPN(
        TopNCount,
        SUMMARIZE(
            Report_Payment_Vs_Due,
            Report_Payment_Vs_Due[InvIssuer_InvoiceIssuerCode],
            "AvgDelay", [AverageDelayPerInvoice] 
        ),
        [AvgDelay], DESC
    )
VAR IsTopN = 
    CONTAINS(
        RankedIssuers,
        Report_Payment_Vs_Due[InvIssuer_InvoiceIssuerCode], CurrentIssuer
    )
RETURN
    IF(IsTopN, CurrentIssuer, "Others")
